To the 3rd point, EMA always creates variables -- the average itself, why should we make a compromise to the bias variable because it causes problem.

It seems like these variables are created differently: the average is with `create_slot`, and the bias/local_step with `get_variable` which causes the problem. Should we make changes so that it doesn't cause problems anymore, instead of not using it?
